org.spongepowered.api.entity.living.monster

Interface Skeleton

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Agent, ArmorEquipable, Carrier, DataHolder, Entity, EntityState, Equipable, Identifiable, Living, Monster, ProjectileSource

    public interface Skeleton
extends Monster, ArmorEquipable, ProjectileSource
    Represents a Skeleton.

    • Method Detail

      • getSkeletonType

        SkeletonType getSkeletonType()
        Gets the current skeleton type for this skeleton.

        A Skeleton type may change the rendering to a client and also introduce a change in the items this skeleton can pick up and equip.

        Returns:
        The current skeleton type

      • setSkeletonType

        void setSkeletonType(SkeletonType skeletonType)
        Sets the new skeleton type for this skeleton.

        A Skeleton type may change the rendering to a client and also introduce a change in the items this skeleton can pick up and equip.

        Parameters:
        skeletonType - The new skeleton type
